ItemDescription.SecondaryDescription:
+75 Health
+3 Reduction of All Damage Taken
+40 Health And Mana Restored Upon Damaging An Enemy God, 10s Cooldown

ROLE QUEST: SOLO
Dealing damage to an enemy god provides 1 stack. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Getting a Kill or Assist on an Enemy god provides 3 stacks. At 15 Stacks Warrior's Blessing Evolves, gaining +15 Physical and Magical Protection.
